comments.author: John
comments.content: Cool! The same technique works when you need to make 1/2"-wide ribbons of omelet to "weave"  into a lattice over a recipe like Nasi Goreng: you make a 10" thin omelet or two, roll it up, and cut into 1/2" cylinders, and then weave to your heart's content. You get much better results than just trying to cut it straight on the flat.
